an7.67:1.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ranno paccantimam nagaram sattahi nagaraparikkharehi suparikkhatam hoti, catunnanca aharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:1.2: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, ranno paccantimam nagaram akaraniyam bahirehi paccatthikehi paccamittehi.
an7.67:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare esika hoti gambhiranema sunikhata acala asampavedhi.
an7.67:2.3: Imina pathamena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare parikkha hoti gambhira ceva vitthata ca.
an7.67:3.2: Imina dutiyena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare anupariyayapatho hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca.
an7.67:4.2: Imina tatiyena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum avudham sannicitam hoti salakanceva jevanikanca.
an7.67:5.2: Imina catutthena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahubalakayo pativasati, seyyathidam—
an7.67:6.2: hattharoha assaroha rathika dhanuggaha celaka calaka pindadayaka ugga rajaputta pakkhandino mahanaga sura cammayodhino dasakaputta.
an7.67:6.3: Imina pancamena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare dovariko hoti pandito byatto medhavi annatanam nivareta natanam paveseta.
an7.67:7.2: Imina chatthena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare pakaro hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca vasanalepanasampanno ca.
an7.67:8.2: Imina sattamena nagaraparikkharena suparikkhatam hoti ranno paccantimam nagaram abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:9.1: Katamesam catunnam aharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi?
an7.67:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum tinakatthodakam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum saliyavakam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum tilamuggamasaparannam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum bhesajjam sannicitam hoti, seyyathidam—
an7.67:12.2: sappi navanitam telam madhu phanitam lonam abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:12.3: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam aharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:13.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ranno paccantimam nagaram imehi sattahi nagaraparikkharehi suparikkhatam hoti, imesanca catunnam aharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:13.2: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, ranno paccantimam nagaram akaraniyam bahirehi paccatthikehi paccamittehi.
an7.67:13.3: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yato ariyasavako sattahi saddhammehi samannagato hoti, catunnanca jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:13.4: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akaraniyo marassa akaraniyo papimato.
an7.67:14.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare esika hoti gambhiranema sunikhata acala asampavedhi abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:14.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim
an7.67:14.4: Saddhesiko, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:15.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare parikkha hoti gambhira ceva vitthata ca abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:15.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako hirima hoti, hiriyati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriyati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.67:15.3: Hiriparikkho kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:16.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare anupariyayapatho hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:16.2: Evamevam, kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ottappi hoti, ottappati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.67:16.3: Ottappapariyayapatho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:17.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum avudham sannicitam hoti salakanceva jevanikanca abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:17.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako bahussuto hoti …pe… ditthiya suppatividdha.
an7.67:17.3: Sutavudho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:18.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahubalakayo pativasati, seyyathidam—
an7.67:18.2: hattharoha assaroha rathika dhanuggaha celaka calaka pindadayaka ugga rajaputta pakkhandino mahanaga sura cammayodhino dasakaputta abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:18.3: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an7.67:18.4: Viriyabalakayo, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:19.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare dovariko hoti pandito byatto medhavi annatanam nivareta natanam paveseta abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:19.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
an7.67:19.3: Satidovariko, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:20.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare pakaro hoti ucco ceva vitthato ca vasanalepanasampanno ca abbhantaranam guttiya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:20.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an7.67:20.3: Pannavasanalepanasampanno, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti;
an7.67:21.1: Katamesam catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi?
an7.67:21.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum tinakatthodakam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:21.3: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati
an7.67:21.4: attano ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya okkamanaya nibbanassa.
an7.67:22.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum saliyavakam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:22.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati
an7.67:22.3: attano ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya okkamanaya nibbanassa.
an7.67:23.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum tilamuggamasaparannam sannicitam hoti abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:23.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati
an7.67:23.3: attano ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya okkamanaya nibbanassa.
an7.67:24.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ranno paccantime nagare bahum bhesajjam sannicitam hoti, seyyathidam—
an7.67:24.2: sappi navanitam telam madhu phanitam lonam abbhantaranam ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya bahiranam patighataya.
an7.67:24.3: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati
an7.67:24.4: attano ratiya aparitassaya phasuviharaya okkamanaya nibbanassa.
an7.67:24.5: Imesam catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:25.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako imehi sattahi saddhammehi samannagato hoti, imesanca catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an7.67:25.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akaraniyo marassa akaraniyo papimato”ti.
